page.title: 07COMMUNITY LIFE (1)
page.content: {THE MEMORIAL HALL The hall was built in{1926}by the {Seaton Valley Co_operative Society.}It was built because of the victory in the First World War as a memorial to the people who died in it. The hall is mainly called the {Community Centre}now,for the use of the public. This hall is open every day. A list of the activities follows:_ Playgroups, Mothers and toddlers, Bingo, Badminton, Discos, Doctors Surgery, Age Concern, Youth Club, Keep Fit, Archery Club, Cricket Club,Shows, Partys etc.
